NF.Q: In the column Waste Management of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 21474? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Food Banks} has an outflow of {25813}, {Composting} has an outflow of {25631}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Waste Management and column Processing Facilities is the flow between 8552 and 15533? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {13749} from node {Landfills} to {Dairies}, a flow of {9553} from node {Landfills} to {Bakeries}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 6823 and 7088? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {6841} from node {Exporters} to {Recycling}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Dairies to node Greenhouses and from node Dairies to node Orchards, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Dairies} to node {Orchards} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Wholesalers to node Landfills, from node Dairies to node Ranches, and from node Dairies to node Farms, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Dairies} to node {Ranches} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Distribution Channels of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Distribution Channels is {Retailers}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Farmers' Markets to target node Greenhouses? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Farmers' Markets to node Greenhouses is: {Farmers' Markets, Composting, Bakeries, Greenhouses}.
